data.text: @MFStaley No, not for first responders in the health authority region where I live and work. We were told to register with the general population and wait until our age group was eligible to receive the vaccine.
@TwoFox15 There was no First Responder vaccine sites?
@TwoFox15 Because if the guy you just met, suddenly gives you diarrhea, that's acting on impulse. The ad from the seventies said flowers. The shot could give something just so much more...
@5053Boyce @TwoFox15 I'm okay with flu shots and when I give myself insulin injections, I don't always feel it. *shrugs*
@FDChief251 That’s great that you were able to get your PD officers in so early. I’m just thankful that I was able to get my first shot today. You stay safe too! 😊
@DavidMi82034996 That’s great news David! Congratulations to you! 😊
@TwoFox15 I was able to get our PD officers in during Phase 1a. I wish it would have been sooner for y’all. Stay safe!
@TwoFox15 I got done today too. Congratulations pretty cop lady.
@TwoFox15 @newmexicanannie Yes my Deltoid muscle did hurt and was tender to touch. Our muscles don’t like having needles poked in them. The same happens for the flu shot
@TwoFox15 @GrossJeffery Totally agree
@donlehn Hahaha thanks Don. I’m glad to hear that you’ve received your vaccine as well! That’s great new! 💪💪
@newmexicanannie @5053Boyce I’m glad to hear that your experience has been pretty positive Annie. I hope mine will be the same and the side effects will be minor or non-existent. 😊
@GrossJeffery Haha you sweet talker you! Thanks. Yes the pharmacist covered all of the potential side effects with me. 👍 Fingers crossed that I keep feeling well. 😊

@TwoFox15 I hope you feel ok. You could have fever chills and runny nose, light cough and fatigue even diarrhea. I really know how to talk to the ladies. Take the Tylenol if you need. It helps. I hope you have the support you need. Be Healthy, safe and well!

@5053Boyce @TwoFox15 Both doses, I've had a slightly sore shoulder.  2nd dose, I've been really sleepy and sleeping a lot last night and a good nap today.  Everything I've gone through side-effects-wise hasn't been anything major and hasn't hurt like Hades and it's sooooooooooooo worth it!!!!
@TwoFox15 good looking guns...lol-- Moderna a few weeks ago-- same as when I had the shingles vaccine four years ago when Dad got that -- sore arm for a day
@TwoFox15 @newmexicanannie No side effects except for a little headache on day 3. Amazing
@5053Boyce @newmexicanannie That’s great Marilyn! 😊
@newmexicanannie @TwoFox15 Good for you. I had my Pfizer shot a couple weeks ago.

@TwoFox15 I’m very pleased for you too Anne-Marie. Thanks for all that you do!
Stay healthy! #VaccinesWork
@newmexicanannie Double dose.
@TwoFox15 Thanks Anne Marie, you're sweet
@TwoFox15 Is the Astra Zeneca a single or double dose vaccine?
@cdnjuryhelp Thanks Mark! I’m very thankful to have received a vaccination. I’m glad that you’ve received one too! #Vaccinated
@TwoFox15 Amazing!! #VaccinesWork #vaccinated

@newmexicanannie That’s great news that you are fully vaccinated Annie! That’s definitely a relief that you and your family are all vaccinated. 

I received the AstraZeneca vaccine.
@Blondesnobest Thanks. I’m sending good thoughts that soon you’ll be posting that you got vaccinated! 😊
@lazeejjs That’s great news! The pharmacist told me that she thinks I can register for the second dose starting May 1st so I will be looking into that over the weekend.

@TwoFox15 family is now fully vaccinated. Didn't think I'd be able to sleep because of the pain, but after a second round of pain meds, I slept like a baby.  I think the second dose got me so fatigued that it knocked me out, thank God. 🤣 Yes, getting vaccinated is something to celebrate!

@TwoFox15 Which one did you get, Anne-Marie?  I got my 2nd dose of Moderna yesterday. During my 15 min. waiting, the trauma nurse and my doc looked at and wrapped my left leg and if my leg hadn't been in such unbearable pain, I would've definitely celebrated more because my whole  1/2
@TwoFox15 Me too but I'm glad you got yours.
@TwoFox15 Yes! Thanks for asking. Registered for #2!
@WranglingDinos @TwoFox15 Do it!  We need more happy tears. 🙂
@franehennessey @kimmay78 @TwoFox15 Mein gott, ja!
@TwoFox15 @franehennessey @kimmay78 Fountain.  Definitely the fountain.
@lazeejjs Thanks! Have you received your first dose?

@Blondesnobest I hope you get an email or text soon! I suddenly received a text message from the pharmacy last night after 10pm telling me I had 36 hours before the link expired to book an appointment but that there was a limited number of doses available. So I dropped everything & booked!

@TwoFox15 No not yet closest place so far 3hr drive ah not happening. Will wait till gets closer or cheryls test for liver or kidney problems come bacm . Hopefully Friday that results are in will let you know.👍
@TwoFox15 Boo! But great. Glad u for ur first!
@GunOfBavaria @franehennessey @kimmay78 @TwoFox15 😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂👍
@TwoFox15 I'm still waiting
@TwoFox15 @GunOfBavaria @franehennessey I like my chocolate in bar form! 🍫 https://t.co/XBL2XzAlx2
@AndreeAnn_QC Thank you! You have a wonderful rest of your day AndréeAnn!
@GunOfBavaria @franehennessey @kimmay78 😂😂😂 Is that a side effect or just what happens when someone loses all self control by a chocolate fountain? 😂
@franehennessey @kimmay78 @GunOfBavaria Yay! That’s great to hear that you haven’t had any side effects Fran! 🙌

@AndyDonovan64 I’m glad to hear that you have received your first dose! Sorry to hear you weren’t feel well afterwards but I’m glad that you’re feeling better now.

Thx. I know a few people who haven’t registered or signed up for a waitlist so I’m hopeful if they see how easy it is, they will.
@rober18550719 Thank you! You too! I haven’t looked at the forecast but I’m hoping we get to enjoy some nice weather!
@WranglingDinos Thanks Teresa! That’s wonderful news that you get your vaccination tomorrow! It’s a pretty great feeling once you get it! 😊
@TwoFox15 Exactly! It’s all about getting the shot! Have a wonderful day. Be safe 😘
@franehennessey @kimmay78 @TwoFox15 mehr Münder = mehr Schokolade https://t.co/sJsB0Kr69n
@kimmay78 @GunOfBavaria @TwoFox15 No vaccine side effects.🙂🇨🇦 https://t.co/pd8EWAUL6n
@TwoFox15 Yes this past Saturday - was feeling great until Monday and then not so much. But I'm back to feeling myself and rather that than the alternatives. :) Great leadership Anne-Marie.
@TwoFox15 https://t.co/zlxTezTr4X
@TwoFox15 So happy for you Anne-Marie! I get my first one tomorrow and am really excited. I hope I don't break down bawling with gratefulness in public.
@AndyDonovan64 Thanks Andy. I’m pretty happy to have received it. Have you been vaccinated yet?
@IamTuckOGrady That’s great news! Congrats on being fully vaccinated!
@AndreeAnn_QC That’s great that you’ve received your 1st doses. I got the AstraZeneca. I was happy to take whichever vaccine was available for me! 😊
@kimmay78 That’s great! You guys are way ahead of us!
@kimmay78 I’m glad you’ve been vaccinated too Kim. That’s good that you didn’t have any other side effects.

@GunOfBavaria I’m glad that your wife was able to receive a vaccine as well. I hope she feels better soon. So far so good for me with side effects but a friend of mine warned me that she felt pretty awful for a day after she received her vaccine. 🤞🤞
@TwoFox15 Awesome.
@TwoFox15 Welcome. I've had both jabs. I'm good.
@TwoFox15 https://t.co/QHz6xVqgCP
@GunOfBavaria @TwoFox15 I found I was really tired after mine but no other side effects.  Glad you guys have been vaccinated as well!
@TwoFox15 Yessss April 10th my spouse and I got the Pfizer!👍🏻 There is a feeling of relief even though we need the 2nd dose and still do the mask and social distancing! Which one did you get?
@TwoFox15 I had my first Pfizer dose 4 weeks ago.  My second is booked for July. 🙏🏻
@TwoFox15 @kimmay78 Wife got her first dose of Moderna last night. She’s having some side effects tonight - but that’s a good thing.  Hope you’re doing well.
@IamTuckOGrady Thanks! 😄
@army_bc Thanks Mike. Have you and Cheryl been able to get vaccinated?
@heinrichs_helen 🙌🙌🙏
@AndreeAnn_QC Thanks! I’m happy I was able to get an appointment today! Have you received your vaccine?

@lazeejjs The health authority where I live & work didn’t have anything set up for first responders with our agency. VPD officers were able to be vaccinated a few weeks ago with Vancouver Coastal Health. Since I am no longer VPD I had to wait until my age came up in the general population.
@TwoFox15 So glad that you got your first vaccine! First Responders should have had top priority to receive the vaccine first. You put your lives in danger everyday!👍👊🏻🙏♥️💙
@kimmay78 Thanks Kim! Me too! Have you received yours?
@LindaYpenburg Thanks Linda! I’m very thankful to have received it. It’s only been a few hours but so far so good. 🤞🤞 I’m glad that you were able to get your vaccination ASAP!

right on time, & once I waited 15 min after I was #Vaccinated , I was able to leave. In & out! If you haven’t had any luck with the pop up clinics, make sure you sign up on a waitlist at a pharmacy & hopefully you’ll get that happy email soon to book an appointment! 3/ 😊💉
@TwoFox15 Nice jab-

@TwoFox15 That’s awesome, Cpl. Anne-Marie Clarke! You should have gotten the vaccine sooner! I got my first dose Pfizer vaccine over a month ago. I work in one of the Surrey Elementary schools. Hope you didn’t have any severe side effects!👍👊🏻♥️💙
@TwoFox15 I’m so happy you got your first vaccine! 💙

@TwoFox15 I would have thought you and your colleagues would have been vaccinated long ago as First Responders! Glad you got it though!! Is your unit responsible for getting it themselves? Same with VPD?
@TwoFox15 Nice pic
@TwoFox15 I get my 2nd shot next week!  Way to rock the vaccination look 😍🥰 keep us posted how you're feeling! https://t.co/AB4QJfzhYo
@TwoFox15 Great news Anne-Marie!👍🏻🙏🙏

going to be a while before my age group in the general population was contacted to book an appointment, so I also signed up on a waitlist at a local pharmacy. It took a few weeks of waiting, but it was worth it knowing that I had an appointment today. I received my vaccination 2/
@TwoFox15 💯
